Html:
Hi guyz, I'm from Brazil.

Could you please add the new realms? I can't import a character from Goldrinn and Nemesis.

Thank You.

I think I can get those servers added before the next release. EU and PT_BR right? I think the PT_BR needs a bit more work to support but the EU ones should not take that long to do.

Edit:

If I can find a list....Blizz has yet to update their server status website with a list of Portuguese servers.

Hi...

Actually I only know the brazilian realms... but I know that some where added to EU too.

Here are the new servers:

Goldrinn (PVE)

Nemesis (PVP)

Tol'Barad (PVP)


Edit:

I've found the EU portuguese realm:

Aggra (PVE)

I hope this helps!

TY again

I'll get those added.

Edit:

can you link your character's name and server so that I can test?

Ok I have Goldrinn, Nemesis, and Aggra tested and works. Tol'Barad I was not able to find anyone to test with. Plus the US client is showing "Tol Barad" (with a space) so I'm not sure which is correct. For the time being I'll use"Tol'Barad" until otherwise noted.

The realm is online, but we can't access the armory yet.

But you are correct... apparently the name is "Tol Barad" (with a space).

Just a question:

Do you have an ETA when these changes will be applied to the elitist jerks version? (elitistjerks.com/rawr.php)
Whenever Kavan decides to release the next release. I posted a patch a few hours ago.

Hi,

There is yet another new brazilian server:

Azralon (PvP)

 

Here is a link to test: http://us.battle.net/wow/pt/character/azralon/Turwok/simple

Thanks.
kk I've just added Azralon to the realm listing. It should be in the next release.
